targets.query:
import "dict"
activePower = ["data_set_MODBUS16","data_set_MODBUS23","data_set_MODBUS30","data_set_MODBUS37","data_set_MODBUS44"]
zone = ["data_set_MODBUS16":"NODEA","data_set_MODBUS23":"NODEB","data_set_MODBUS30":"NODEC","data_set_MODBUS37":"NODED","data_set_MODBUS44":"NODEE"]
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(set: activePower, value: r._field)) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with zone: dict.get(dict: zone, key:r._field, default: ""),})) 
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> group(columns: ["zone"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(fn: (column) => {_newColumnName = if column =~ /^_/ then "" else column return _newColumnName})

from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "data_set_MODBUS06")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"]) 
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "data_set_MODBUS06")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"]) 
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "data_set_MODBUS06")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"]) 
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"]) 
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IFINITY/Master")
  |> range(start: -1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assert")
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["assertid"] == "${assertID}")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])

import "dict"
import "strings"
data = {"{NODEA,NODEB,NODEC,NODED,NODEE}":"data_set_MODBUS06","NODEA":"data_set_MODBUS16","NODEB":"data_set_MODBUS23","NODEC":"data_set_MODBUS30","NODED":"data_set_MODBUS37","NODEE":"data_set_MODBUS44"}
modebusid=""
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with modebusid:data["${assertID}"]})) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == r.modebusid)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if strings.countStr(v: "${assertID}", substr: ",")> 1 then r._value else r._value / 1000.0}))

import "dict"
import "strings"
data = {"{NODEA,NODEB,NODEC,NODED,NODEE}":"data_set_MODBUS12","NODEA":"data_set_MODBUS18","NODEB":"data_set_MODBUS26","NODEC":"data_set_MODBUS32","NODED":"data_set_MODBUS39","NODEE":"data_set_MODBUS46"}
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with modebusid:data["${assertID}"]})) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == r.modebusid)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["modebusid", "tag"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if strings.countStr(v: "${assertID}", substr: ",")> 1 then r._value else r._value / 1000.0}))

import "date"
import "dict"
import "strings"
dates =[2:"Monday",3:"Tuesday",4:"Wednesday",5:"Thursday",6:"Friday",0:"Saturday",1:"Sunday"]
data = {"{NODEA,NODEB,NODEC,NODED,NODEE}":"data_set_MODBUS06","NODEA":"data_set_MODBUS16","NODEB":"data_set_MODBUS23","NODEC":"data_set_MODBUS30","NODED":"data_set_MODBUS37","NODEE":"data_set_MODBUS44"}
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with modebusid:data["NODEA"]})) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == r.modebusid)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> sort(columns: ["key"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    namedDay:
      dict.get(dict: dates, key:date.weekDay(t: r._time), default: ""),
  })) 
 |> drop(columns: ["modebusid", "tag"])
 |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
 |> group(columns: ["namedDay"])
 |> sum(column: "_value")
 |> rename(fn: (column) => {_newColumnName = if column =~ /^_/ then "" else column return _newColumnName})
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if strings.countStr(v: "NODEA", substr: ",")> 1 then r._value else r._value / 1000.0}))
 |> drop(columns: ["_value", "tag"])

import "date"
import "dict"
import "strings"
weeks = [0: "Week 1",1: "Week 2",2: "Week 3",3: "Week 4",4: "Week 5",5: "Week 6",6: "Week 7",7: "Week 8",8: "Week 9",9: "Week 10",10: "Week 11",11: "Week 12",12: "Week 13",13: "Week 14",14: "Week 15",15: "Week 16",16: "Week 17",17: "Week 18",18: "Week 19",19: "Week 20",20: "Week 21",21: "Week 22",22: "Week 23",23: "Week 24",24: "Week 25",25: "Week 26",26: "Week 27",27: "Week 28",28: "Week 29",29: "Week 30",30: "Week 31",31: "Week 32",32: "Week 33",33: "Week 34",34: "Week 35",35: "Week 36",36: "Week 37",37: "Week 38",38: "Week 39",39: "Week 40",40: "Week 41",41: "Week 42",42: "Week 43",43: "Week 44",44: "Week 45",45: "Week 46",46: "Week 47",47: "Week 48",48: "Week 49",49: "Week 50",50: "Week 51",51: "Week 52"]
data = {"{NODEA,NODEB,NODEC,NODED,NODEE}":"data_set_MODBUS06","NODEA":"data_set_MODBUS16","NODEB":"data_set_MODBUS23","NODEC":"data_set_MODBUS30","NODED":"data_set_MODBUS37","NODEE":"data_set_MODBUS44"}
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -1mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with modebusid:data["${assertID}"]})) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == r.modebusid)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 7d, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> sort(columns: ["key"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    namedDay:
      dict.get(dict: weeks, key:date.week(t: r._time), default: ""),
  })) 
 |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
 |> group(columns: ["namedDay"])
 |> sum(column: "_value")
 |> rename(fn: (column) => {_newColumnName = if column =~ /^_/ then "" else column return _newColumnName})
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if strings.countStr(v: "${assertID}", substr: ",")> 1 then r._value else r._value / 1000.0}))
 |> drop(columns: ["_value", "tag"])

import "date"
import "dict"
import "strings"
months = [1:"January",2:"February",3:"March",4:"April",5:"May",6:"June",7:"July",8:"August",9:"September",10:"October",11:"November",12: "December"]
data = {"{NODEA,NODEB,NODEC,NODED,NODEE}":"data_set_MODBUS06","NODEA":"data_set_MODBUS16","NODEB":"data_set_MODBUS23","NODEC":"data_set_MODBUS30","NODED":"data_set_MODBUS37","NODEE":"data_set_MODBUS44"}
from(bucket: "IFINITY")
  |> range(start: -12mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /data_set/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with modebusid:data["${assertID}"]})) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == r.modebusid)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> sort(columns: ["key"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    namedMonth:
      dict.get(dict: months, key:date.month(t: r._time), default: ""),
  })) 
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
 |> group(columns: ["namedMonth"])
 |> sum(column: "_value")
 |> rename(fn: (column) => {_newColumnName = if column =~ /^_/ then "" else column return _newColumnName})
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if strings.countStr(v: "${assertID}", substr: ",")> 1 then r._value else r._value / 1000.0}))
 |> drop(columns: ["_value", "tag"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "IFINITY/Master")
  |> range(start: -1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assert")
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["name", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["description", "tag"])
list.label: Assert ID
list.name: assertID
